security_audit.summary: All 20 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. This skill directory contains only documentation (SKILL.md) and a generated report (skill-report.json). No executable code exists. The static analyzer misidentified Chinese UTF-8 characters as encrypted content, JSON metadata fields as cryptographic algorithms, and documentation references as shell commands. This is a pure documentation artifact for a workflow orchestration skill.

content.value_statement: Manually researching trending topics and drafting content is time-consuming and inconsistent. This orchestrator skill automates the complete workflow from hot topic discovery to AI-generated content with viral potential scoring.
actual_capabilities: Discovers trending topics from TopHub hotæ¦œå•
Selects top 10 viral-worthy topics using AI analysis
Generates draft content in Defou x Stanley style
Scores content across 6 viral potential dimensions
Produces final optimized articles ready for publishing
Orchestrates end-to-end workflow without manual intervention
limitations: Only works within the Defou Workflow Agent ecosystem
Requires access to TopHub for hotæ¦œå• data
Output quality depends on upstream skill configurations
Language style is fixed to Defou x Stanley tone

use_cases.title: Scale content production
use_cases.description: Generate dozens of viral-ready posts weekly with consistent quality and brand voice.

use_cases.title: Trend-driven posting
use_cases.description: Automate discovery of trending topics and quickly publish relevant content.

use_cases.title: Curated content pipeline
use_cases.description: Build automated pipeline for topic research, drafting, and quality verification.

prompt_templates.title: Basic run
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the master orchestrator skill to generate viral content from trending topics.

prompt_templates.title: Check outputs
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the verified posts in the outputs directory and their viral scores.

prompt_templates.title: Custom topics
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate content for these specific topics: [list topics] using the master orchestrator.

prompt_templates.title: Batch processing
prompt_templates.prompt: Run master orchestrator to process 50 trending topics and output top 20 verified posts.

output: Selected top 10 viral topics using AI scoring
Generated 10 draft posts in Defou x Stanley style
Top performer: Post 1 with overall score 8.4/10

best_practices: Configure upstream skills (tophub, viral-verification) before running orchestrator
Review viral scores to understand which topics performed best
Use the orchestrator for batch processing rather than single posts
Check outputs regularly to verify quality meets your standards
anti_patterns: Running orchestrator without upstream skills properly configured
Ignoring viral verification scores and publishing untested content
Expecting the orchestrator to create content outside its defined style
Using for single posts when batch processing is more efficient

faq.question: What skills does master orchestrator require?
faq.answer: It orchestrates tophub-defou-stanley-combo for content generation and viral-verification for quality scoring.

faq.question: How long does a full run take?
faq.answer: Processing 100 trending topics typically takes 5-10 minutes depending on topic complexity.

faq.question: Can I use my own writing style?
faq.answer: The orchestrator uses Defou x Stanley style. For custom styles, modify the upstream content generation skill.

faq.question: Where are results saved?
faq.answer: Final verified posts are saved to outputs/viral-verified-posts/ directory in the project.

faq.question: What viral dimensions are scored?
faq.answer: The quality engine scores across 6 dimensions including emotional appeal, shareability, and timeliness.

faq.question: Does it work in English?
faq.answer: The skill is designed for Chinese content workflows. English support requires upstream skill modifications.
